definition.procedurexml: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block type="event_trigger" deletable="false" x="40" y="40"><field name="trigger">no_ext_trigger</field><next><block type="controls_if"><comment pinned="false" h="80" w="160">vial must be equipped to have its 'active' texture</comment><value name="IF0"><block type="is_equipped"><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value><value name="item"><block type="itemstack_to_mcitem"></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="controls_if"><comment pinned="false" h="80" w="160">show active texture when at least 1 armor piece is active, or the player is in Creative mode</comment><value name="IF0"><block type="logic_binary_ops" inline="false"><field name="OP">OR</field><value name="A"><block type="math_binary_ops"><field name="OP">GT</field><value name="A"><block type="procedure_retval_number"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" inputs="0"></mutation><field name="procedure">EnergyVialActiveArmorPieces</field></block></value><value name="B"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">0</field></block></value></block></value><value name="B"><block type="entity_iscreative"><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="return_number"><value name="return"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">1</field></block></value></block></statement></block></statement><next><block type="return_number"><value name="return"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">0</field></block></value></block></next></block></next></block></xml>
